title: Bug 23935 - Text widget with Tree parent does not lose focus
description: Both widgets are children of the shell. The issue is only observed on Windows. It is suggested that a workaround can be implemented by creating the text editor as a sibling of the tree and moving it above the tree.
OB: When clicking anywhere in the tree, the tree retains focus.
EB: When clicking anywhere in the tree, the tree should lose focus.
SR:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Create a Tree widget as a parent of a Text widget within a Shell.
2. Click anywhere within the Tree widget.
Expected result: The Tree widget should lose focus.
